basics.name: Fawaz Adeniji
basics.label: Robotics Software Engineer
basics.summary: Specializing in computer vision perception, embedded systems, and autonomous integration. Proven experience deploying real-time Edge AI on hardware and architecting robust software systems for robotic ecosystems.

highlights: Developing and maintaining backend systems using Node.js, Express, and TypeScript.
Developed and maintained core product services by using TypeScript and JavaScript.
Built and documented new features and APIs, and supported frontend engineers with API integrations.
Mentored over 50 students in robotics software fundamentals, focusing on logic and control loops.
Facilitated hardware labs centered on embedded system logic and robotic assembly using LEGO SPIKE Prime.

projects.name: Mobile Biometric Perception System
projects.description: Engineered an Edge AI perception pipeline on Raspberry Pi using OpenCV for real-time facial recognition and biometric tracking.
highlights: Optimized local inference for resource-constrained hardware.
Integrated perception unit with cloud-based backend.
